div.p: The style of appointment or patient for appointment booking (not service type). These concepts are used in the FHIR Appointment, Schedule and Slot resources. The Argonaut Scheduling Visit Types are mapped to these concepts.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v2-0276

description.value: The style of appointment or patient for appointment booking (not service type). These concepts are used in the FHIR Appointment, Schedule and Slot resources. The [Argonaut Scheduling Visit Types](ConceptMap-visit-appt-map.html) are mapped to these concepts.
